div.p: This Maven plugin generates the Netbeans Module (NBM) files.
Currently the plugin ensures that your artifacts become Netbeans modules, creates nbm files for easy updating, not only for your project but possibly also for it's dependencies.

In order to run the plugin, you need to get the nbantext.jar file from netbeans.org. Currently it's not downloadable, you will need to build it from the sources, and checkout the nbbuild module from Netbeans' cvs. Then go to nbbuild directory and run ant. Once the nbantext.jar file is created you can about the build.
